bibl.title: Der Menschenraub im kaiserzeitlichen Ägypten.
When West Met East. The Encounter of Greece and Rome with the Jews, Egyptians, and Others. Studies Presented to Ranon Katzoff in Honor of his 75th Birthday

bibl.seg: Andrea Jördens, Der Menschenraub im kaiserzeitlichen Ägypten.

David M. Schaps, Uri Yiftach & Daniela Dueck (edd.), When West Met East. The Encounter of Greece and Rome with the Jews, Egyptians, and Others. Studies Presented to Ranon Katzoff in Honor of his 75th Birthday = Graeca Tergestina. Storia e Civiltà. 3 (Trieste, 2016) pp. 235-253.
